welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Upper Grand Lagoon, the charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches, friendly locals, and endless opportunities for adventure. We invite you to soak up the sun, take in the sights, and make unforgettable memories in our beloved city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at NW Florida Beaches Int Airport is a modern and spacious building, offering a variety of dining and shopping options for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at NW Florida Beaches Int Airport is a smaller terminal that primarily serves domestic flights. It features comfortable seating areas and a few dining options.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at NW Florida Beaches Int Airport is the newest terminal, opened in 2020. It offers a modern and efficient travel experience with a variety of amenities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
